column3: I confirm that I have read and understand the information sheet. Access the information sheet
column4: I understand what participation in this study involves
column5: I have had the opportunity to consider the information and to ask questions. A researcher answered my questions satisfactorily.
column6: I understand that my child will be assigned a 6-digit study code upon enrolment in the study and that his/her responses  will be only recorded under this study code.  Personal information will be stored securely and confidential  and separate from responses on any of the study measures.
column7: I understand that my son/daughters participation is voluntary and that we are free to withdraw at any time  without having to give any reason.
column8: I agree for my son/daughter to play cognitive games on a tablet/smartphone
column9: I agree to fill in some questionnaires about my childs behavior.
